general.prompt_name: Hello there! My name is %{name}. What's yours?
general.greet: Hi %{name}, that's a nice name! I'm going to ask you some questions about how you spent your time in school today. You can just reply me with a 'yes' or a 'no'. If you type something else, I'll just pretend I didn't see that and ask you the same question again. Now, are you ready to start?
general.summary: Excellent work! I think that's enough questions for now. Here's a summary of what you did in school today:

conversation.activity_eat: Did you eat something in school today?
conversation.activity_play: Did teacher let you play in school today?
conversation.activity_learn: Did you learn something new today?
conversation.target_food_waffles: Did you eat your favourite waffles?
conversation.target_game_slides: Did you play at the slides?
conversation.target_game_sandbox: Did you play at the sandbox area?
conversation.target_game_toys: Did you play with some toys?
conversation.target_game_trains: Did you play with a toy train?
conversation.target_game_cars: Did you play with a toy car?
conversation.target_game_playmat: Did you play at the playmat?
conversation.target_game_build: Did you play with building blocks?
conversation.target_game_bears: Did you play with a teddy bear?
conversation.target_game_alphabets: Did you play with block alphabets?
conversation.target_game_numbers: Did you play with block numbers?
conversation.target_subject_alphabets: Did you study about the alphabets?
conversation.target_subject_numbers: Did you study about the numbers?
conversation.target_subject_drawing: Did you learn how to draw?
conversation.target_subject_writing: Did your teacher show you how to write?
conversation.target_subject_reading: Did your teacher teach you how to read?
conversation.target_person_police: Did you meet a police officer?
conversation.target_person_friend: Did you talk to your best friend?
conversation.target_person_doctor: Did you see the school doctor?
conversation.feedback_food_alot: Did you eat a lot of it?
conversation.feedback_food_share: Did you share it with someone?
conversation.feedback_game_group: Did you play with your friends?
conversation.feedback_game_meet: Did you meet new friends when playing the game?
conversation.feedback_subject_homework: Do you have homework about it?
conversation.feedback_subject_fun: Do you find the subject fun?
conversation.feedback_beverage_sweet: Did you find the drink sweet?
conversation.feedback_beverage_share: Did you share it with anyone?
conversation.feedback_beverage_cup: Did you drink it from a cup?
conversation.feedback_person_happy: Were you happy to see him or her?
conversation.feedback_person_talked: Did you talk to him or her?
conversation.feedback_person_greet: Did you greet him or her?
conversation.feedback_person_group: Was he or she alone or in a group?
